name: Beach Hunter
description:
After another day of life, you just want to go home and relax so that you can do it all again the next day. In this game, you’re just trying to go home, but some annoying neighborhood kids snatched them when you weren’t looking and hid them as a joke. Now your patience is running thin. Can you make it home before you absolutely lose it?

The goal of the game in ‘Beach Hunter’ is to find your keys before time runs and your character loses it. Losing your patience and hitting children wouldn’t look good for you and your career, so it’s important that you succeed. Collecting coins increases the amount of time that you have (because who can get impatient when you’re getting free money). Be careful though, tripping on rocks might be a good way to injure/frustrate yourself.

The player searches for their key while avoiding any rocks they might come across. The player also collects coins to increase their time limit. The player finds the key and gets to go home without beating up any little kids. They also need to move fast or else the timer will cause them to lose.
